title: Home loan slowdown drives retail credit moderation in June 2024: CIBIL report
description: India's retail credit growth slowed in June 2024, driven by a significant drop in home loan originations. The TransUnion CIBIL report shows a decline across various loan categories, with personal loans and credit cards hit hardest. Despite this, credit performance improved for most loans, except for credit cards.
